title: Max's Christmas (K)
creator_credit: Michael Sporn Animation, Weston Woods Studios, Paul R. Gagne and Michael Sporn
brief_description: Ruby can’t get her little brother Max to go to sleep on Christmas Eve, and the fun begins as Max sneaks downstairs hoping to see Santa. Based on the book of the same title by Rosemary Wells. Voices: Jenny Agutter and Rex Robbins.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Sporn Animation, Weston Woods Studios, Paul R. Gagne and Michael Sporn
